title: Spacious 6-Bed Family Haven with Garden and Modern Wellness Near Nature
description: This inviting six-bedroom house offers the perfect blend of comfort and function for modern families. Spanning a generous 350 sqm, the home has three bathrooms, sizeable living spaces, and thoughtfully laid-out bedrooms to give everyone privacy and room to grow. Enjoy the tranquility of a private garden—ideal for pets and children—and stay fit year-round in the shared sauna or fitness center. Safety and sustainability are a priority, featuring motion-sensor exterior lighting and energy-efficient windows. The property also includes an underground garage with ample storage for vehicles and kids' bicycles.
neighborhood_description: Situated in the peaceful Suburb neighborhood of Pila, this low-urban area is distinguished by its green spaces, relaxed pace, and safe, close-knit atmosphere. This location is highly family-friendly and pet-welcoming, with shopping options and cozy dining venues just a short drive away. Convenient highway access allows for smooth journeys into the town center or out to nature escapes, making it ideal for those valuing fresh air and space.
lifestyle_benefits: ample space for large families or multigenerational living
quiet, safe surroundings for children to play
convenient highway access for commuting and trips
target_buyer: The home is ideally suited for large families seeking space to grow, pet owners, or multigenerational households who value tranquility and premium features in a safe, welcoming environment.
market_positioning: This property stands out in the Pila market by offering a rare mix of practical family-focused amenities, generous inside and outside space, and wellness facilities. It’s competitively priced given its substantial size, modern features, and appealing location for buyers seeking a serene yet conveniently connected home base.
